column1: # Title: Paper technology lifetimes and shutdown rates
# Units: Years for lifetime and half.life; Unitless for shutdown.rate; steepness; median.shutdown.point; profit.shutdown.steepness
# Comments: maximum lifetime of cohort. If no retirement function is used; the entire cohort is retired in this number of years.
# shutdown.rate: portion of cohort retired each year; used by the phased-shutdown-decider retirement function.
# half.life: number of years at which 50% of the cohort is retired; using the s-curve-shutdown-decider retirement function.
# steepness: shape parameter used by the s-curve-shutdown-decider retirement function.
# median.shutdown.point: profit-ratio at which 50% of the cohort is shut down for lack of profitability.
# profit.shutdown.steepness: shape parameter of profit-shutdown-decider function.
